description:
7/15 UPDATE - The Easiest Way to Approach Potential Advertisers

3/15 UPDATE - ExactDrive Recommendation Removed

1/15 UPDATE - Free White Label Ad Exchange

11/14 UPDATE - Alternative DSP

10/14 UPDATE - Targeting 201, FAQ

WHICH OF THESE GETS YOU MOST EXCITED?

  • Starting a new 400% profit business with no upfront cost
  • Revitalizing your existing business for pennies on the dollar
  • Recruiting 1000's of new students for your Udemy course
  • Becoming "Employee of the Year" by showing this to your boss

If you see yourself in any of those statements, this course is for you!

AT A GLANCE

  • See inside my RTB wholesale advertising account
  • Watch everything I do to get these amazing results
  • Less than 10 minutes to create an ad campaign
  • No start-up costs since ad clients pay in advance
  • Student Mastermind facebook group
  • I'm here to help you every step of the way

STUDENTS ARE LOVING THIS COURSE

  • "Taught me how advertise my business in a way I can finally afford... kept my interest... no fluff" - DeEtta Moffett
  • "Went through the course once. Now I'm doing it for the 2nd time" - Alek
  • "Hard to find RTB info on the web. This course answered all my questions!" - J. Steen (Castro)
  • "The scope and reach for this could be huge. Many thanks for sharing this." - Ian Cunningham

HOW IS THIS POSSIBLE?

Remember the days when only Wall Street stock brokers could buy and sell stocks? Then along came E-Trade, which gave direct access to consumers and dramatically decreased the cost of trading stocks.

History is repeating itself, this time in the digital advertising industry.

PARTIAL SCHOLARSHIPS AVAILABLE If you need this course to start or save your business, but cannot afford to pay full price, I want to help you. Just message me with what you can afford by clicking on my name on the left side of the page. God bless!
title: How to Easily 2X Your New Customers with Retargeting & RTB
